List Commands:
<color=#FFFF00>/{0} on</color> - Enable GUI
<color=#FFFF00>/{0} off</color> - Disable GUI
<color=#FFFF00>/{0} auto</color> - Enable/Disable automated looting
<color=#FFFF00>/{0} <s | style> <center | lite | right | custom></color> - change GUI style
<color=#FFFF00>/{0} <c | conatiner> <main | wear | belt></color> - add/remove container type from the sort
